profile.title: Frontend Software Engineer
profile.subtitle: Architecture • Accessibility • Performance • Scalability
profile.headline: I build robust, accessible, and scalable interfaces for highly complex digital products.
profile.about: Frontend Software Engineer with strong expertise in application architecture, accessibility (WCAG/ARIA), performance, and legacy system modernization. Experience with React, Angular, AngularJS, TypeScript, microfrontends (Single-SPA), monorepos, design systems, and DDD applied to frontend. Working on large-scale enterprise products, focused on code quality, frontend-backend integration, and sustainable software evolution.

Technical reference in accessibility and performance for the entire team
